byline.contributor: Aleksandar Dimishkovski contributed reporting from Skopje, Macedonia.

abstract: European Commission document shows Macedonia's increasingly authoritarian government was behind wiretapping scandal; report points to fragility of nation's democracy.
lead_paragraph: According to a European Commission report, the national security service acted on orders from the government. The prime minister reacted defiantly.

headline.main: Macedonia Government Is Blamed for Wiretapping Scandal
headline.print_headline: Macedonia Wiretapping Scandal Is Traced to Government

snippet: According to a European Commission report, the national security service acted on orders from the government. The prime minister reacted defiantly.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
